item.description: One of my 2023 new year’s wish was to write a blog post for each month, as you can see it didn’t happended, sometimes we don’t get what we want, right?! (me convincing myself that). But back to the idea of the post, who am I? My name is Alexandre, online aka 1garo, and yes a developer, but we’ll talk about that on other posts, let’s get back to non-sense.
